title: New: Dive In – Don't Break Yourself Apart
body:
With their two EP’s released in 2015, synth-pop five piece **Dive In** made quite the introduction, and set themselves out for an even bigger 2016.

Their return, Don’t Break Yourself Apart is another slice of explosive, festival ready pop, licked with a healthy slice of early 00’s punk-pop. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
